sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, ListGroupItem, Label } from 'reactstrap'; import { Aperture } from 'react-feather'; import Skeleton, { SkeletonTheme } from 'react-loading-skeleton'; import "../../styles.css"; import moment from "moment"; import _ from "lodash"; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player'; const TabsetIndividualLiveListingHelper = ({ passedData, ready, user }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const [ highest, setHighestBid ] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { if (passedData !== null && typeof passedData.bids !== "undefined" && passedData.bids.length > 0) { console.log("RUNNNNNNNING.....!"); setHighestBid(Math.max.apply(Math, passedData.bids.map((o) => { return o.amount; }))); } }, [passedData]) console.log("passedData bids?", passedData); const notSpecified = "Not Specified."; return (
setActiveTab('1')}> Recent Bids, Tags & Demo Video
setActiveTab('2')}> {"Poster/User Information"}
{ready === true ?

{"Hashtags/Relevant-Tags (Searchable)"}

{passedData.hashtags ? passedData.hashtags.map((tag, index) => { return {tag.text}; }) : null}

{_.has(user, "aboutMe") ? user.aboutMe : "None Provided."}

{passedData.auctionPurchaseType.includes("auction") ?

{"Most Recent Bids"}

{/* passedData.bids */} {passedData !== null && typeof passedData.bids !== "undefined" && passedData.bids.length > 0 ? passedData.bids.map((bid, index) => { return (
{`Bid placed for approximately $${bid.amount.toFixed(2)}`}
{`Bid approx. ${moment(bid.bidDate).fromNow()}`}

{`(User's Username goes here) place a bid for $${bid.amount.toFixed(2)}(USD) about ${moment(bid.bidDate).fromNow()}...`}

{highest === bid.amount ? "Highest Current Bid Standing!" : "NOT a winning bid."} ); }) : null}
: null}

{"Video Demo/Preview (if applicable)"}

{_.has(passedData, "videoDemoFile") ? : }
: null} {ready === true ?
  • {_.has(user, "yearsOfExperience") ? `${user.yearsOfExperience.value} years of total CS experience` : notSpecified}
  • {"Username"}

    {_.has(user, "username") ? user.username : "None Provided."}

  • {"Age"}

    {_.has(user, "birthdate") ? moment(user.birthdate).fromNow(true) + "old" : notSpecified}

  • {"Successfully Completed Gigs/Jobs"}

    {_.has(user, "completedJobs") ? `${user.completedJobs} completed jobs/gigs` : notSpecified}

  • {_.has(passedData, "likes") ? passedData.likes : notSpecified} have liked this listing!
  • {"Full Name"}

    {`${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`}

  • {"Number(#) Of Reviews"}

    {user.reviews.length} Current Reviews

  • {"Gender"}

    {_.has(user, "gender") ? user.gender.label : "None Provided"}

  • {"Public Email Address (@)"}

    {_.has(user, "publicEmailAddress") ? user.publicEmailAddress : notSpecified}

  • {`${process.env.REACT_APP_APPLICATION_NAME} RANK/LVL`}

    Level #{user.rankLevel}

  • {"Registered"}

    {moment(user.registrationDate).fromNow()}

  • {"Title"}

    {_.has(user, "title") ? user.title : notSpecified}

 :

} ); } export default TabsetIndividualLiveListingHelper;
